thread.title: Crimson Fox in a New Promo for Powerless!
thread.title_full: Crimson Fox in a New Promo for Powerless!

author: CS
title: Crimson Fox in a New Promo for Powerless!

organizations.name: research and development for wayne security

text:
SHARE Crimson Fox in a new promo for Powerless! 
It’s no bird or plane… it’s Crimson Fox battling an unknown villain in a new Powerless promo that you can watch below! Powerless will premiere on Thursday, February 2 at 8:30pm ET/PT on NBC . 
Emily Locke ( Vanessa Hudgens ) lands her dream job as Director of Research and Development for Wayne Security in Charm City, home to super heroes and villains and citizens fed up with the collateral damage of their constant fighting. Full of confidence and big ideas, Emily quickly learns that her aspirations far exceed those of her new boss and officemates, so it will be up to her to lead the team toward their full potential and the realization that you don’t need superpowers to be a hero. 
The Powerless cast also includes Alan Tudyk ( Moana , Rogue One: A Star Wars Story ), Danny Pudi ( Community , Captain America: The Winter Soldier ) and Christina Kirk ( Along Came Polly , A – Z ). 
RELATED: NBC Midseason 2017 Schedule Revealed 
Ben Queen serves as writer and executive producer. Michael Patrick Jann (who directed the pilot) also executive produces. Powerless is produced by Warner Bros. Television and based on the characters from DC Comics . It’s no bird or plane, it’s #Powerless ! Premiering Thursday, February 2 at 8:30/7:30c on NBC. pic.twitter.com/NuGr0KEqQo
